categories.name: Clothing
categories.description: All human wearing apparel suitable for general use

categories.name: Software as a Service
categories.description: Pre-written software, delivered electronically, but access remotely.

categories.name: Digital Goods
categories.description: Digital products transferred electronically, meaning obtained by the purchaser by means other than tangible storage media.

categories.name: Soft Drinks
categories.description: Soft drinks, soda, and other similar beverages. Does not include fruit juices and water.

categories.name: Bottled Water
categories.description: Bottled, drinkable water for human consumption.

categories.name: Prepared Foods
categories.description: Foods intended for on-site consumption. Ex. Restaurant meals.

categories.name: Non-Prescription
categories.description: Drugs for human use without a prescription

categories.name: Prescription
categories.description: Drugs for human use with a prescription
